COMMENT_TX: ej,gricb001,P,mckej901,Charging mound $Roger Erickson threw the 2-1 pitch behind Bobby Grich, who charged the mound and hit Erickson with his forearm; both benches cleared and a brawl ensued; Rich Chiles body blocked Grich; Grich ejected by HP umpire Jim McKean

25 minute rain delay before start of game

$Carew's long fly was apparently caught by LeFlore, but was dropped when he ran into the fence; 1B umpire Kaiser initially ruled it a catch, then changed his call when the ball was dropped; the runner at 2nd, Powell, returned to his base when he saw the out call, but Smalley had continued to run and was out for passing Powell
